name: prnhub-updates
description: Static update endpoint for PRNHub app

scripts.build: echo 'No build needed - static files only'
scripts.validate: node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('public/update.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✅ update.json is valid JSON'); } catch(e) { console.error('❌ Invalid JSON:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
